channel.title: Chinese Feminisim on 人大国新班 2016 级
channel.description: Recent content in Chinese Feminisim on 人大国新班 2016 级

item.title: University Feminists Call for Equality, Spark Controversy
item.description: BEIJING - At one of China’s leading universities, two feminist students chose the annual Girls’ Day — which typically sees Chinese men express their affection for women — to hang banners and provoke an increasingly sensitive debate: about gender equality. As men traditionally give little gifts on Girls’ Day, one banner declared: “No Free Gifts from Boys – I Want Free Rights in Employment!” One of the organizers, who is unwilling to be identified, said: “The call for gender equality should be heard, especially on Girls’ Day.
